languages.text: "Мне действительно сложно сопереживать мутанту. Но благополучие Навигатора есть благополучие всей команды".

traits.locale_text: "Мне действительно сложно сопереживать мутанту. Но благополучие Навигатора есть благополучие всей команды".

languages.text: "It is indeed difficult for me to feel empathy for a mutant. However, the crew's well-being hinges on that of its Navigator."
languages.original_text: "Мне действительно сложно сопереживать мутанту. Но благополучие Навигатора есть благополучие всей команды".

traits.locale_text: "It is indeed difficult for me to feel sympathy for a mutant. However, the crew's well-being hinges on that of its Navigator."
"It is indeed difficult for me to feel sympathy for a mutant. However, the crew's well-being hinges on that of its Navigator."
"It is indeed difficult for me to feel empathy for a mutant. However, the crew's well-being hinges on that of its Navigator."
"It is indeed difficult for me to feel empathy for a mutant. However, the crew's well-being hinges on that of its Navigator."
"It is indeed difficult for me to feel empathy for a mutant. However, the crew's well-being hinges on that of its Navigator."

languages.text: "Es fällt mir in der Tat schwer, Mitleid mit einer Mutantin zu empfinden. Doch das Wohlergehen der Crew hängt von dem ihrer Navigatorin ab."
languages.original_text: "It is indeed difficult for me to feel empathy for a mutant. However, the crew's well-being hinges on that of its Navigator."

traits.locale_text: "Es fällt mir in der Tat schwer, Mitleid mit einer Mutantin zu empfinden. Doch das Wohlergehen der Crew hängt von dem ihrer Navigatorin ab."

languages.text: « J'ai effectivement du mal à éprouver de l'empathie pour une mutante. Cependant, le bien-être de l'équipage dépend de celui de sa navigatrice. »
languages.original_text: "It is indeed difficult for me to feel empathy for a mutant. However, the crew's well-being hinges on that of its Navigator."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai effectivement du mal à éprouver de l'empathie pour une mutante. Cependant, le bien-être de l'équipage dépend de celui de sa navigatrice. »

languages.text: “我对变种人确实没有什么同胞之情。不过，导航者的健康事关全体船员的性命。”
languages.original_text: "It is indeed difficult for me to feel empathy for a mutant. However, the crew's well-being hinges on that of its Navigator."

traits.locale_text: “我对变种人确实没有什么同胞之情。不过，导航者的健康事关全体船员的性命。”

languages.text: 「私にとって、変異体への共感を感じるのは本当に難しい。だが、乗組員の幸福は、航宙士の幸福にかかっている」
languages.original_text: "It is indeed difficult for me to feel empathy for a mutant. However, the crew's well-being hinges on that of its Navigator."

traits.locale_text: 「私にとって、変異体への共感を感じるのは本当に難しい。だが、乗組員の幸福は、航宙士の幸福にかかっている」

languages.text: «En efecto, me resulta difícil sentir empatía por un mutante. Sin embargo, el bienestar de la tripulación depende del de su navegante».
languages.original_text: "It is indeed difficult for me to feel empathy for a mutant. However, the crew's well-being hinges on that of its Navigator."

traits.locale_text: «En efecto, me resulta difícil sentir empatía por un mutante. Sin embargo, el bienestar de la tripulación depende del de su navegante».

languages.text: "Bir mutanta empati beslemek kolay değil elbette ama Rotacı da bizim için elzem. Mürettebatımın iyiliği için katlanacağız artık."
languages.original_text: "It is indeed difficult for me to feel empathy for a mutant. However, the crew's well-being hinges on that of its Navigator."
